title: J9D5: Facilities for Solar Photovoltaic and Battery Systems

contentBlocks.title: Requirements for Facilities Supporting Solar Photovoltaic and Battery Systems
items: Provisions to facilitate the easy retrofit of solar photovoltaic (PV) and battery storage equipment.
Applies to Class 3 buildings and Class 5 to 9 buildings.
Does not apply to stand-alone Class 7a buildings.
Buildings with solar PV panels installed on at least 20% of the roof area may have exemptions or concessions.
Facilities must support the integration of renewable energy systems for future expansion.

metadata.source: NCC 2022 Volume One - Building Code of Australia
